author: sky.cactus
content: I think at this point any changes to the design are probably not worth it unless they bring pretty huge benefits.  I like the general idea of having the TTD be a function of *current* hashrate at well defined points in time, so it can automatically adjust as necessary based on changes in hashrate.  However, I doubt it'll pass the bar for critical enough to add this late in the game.
